step_explanation: Step 5 first erroneously references the result 100 instead of 120 from step 2, resulting in the calculation of 100+24+24=148 instead of 120+24+24=168. This affects the calculation of 148/3=49.3 instead of 168/3=56 in step 6, resulting in an error in the final result. The first step to make a mistake, which is the root cause of the mistake, is step 5, so pred_wrong_step is 5.

Step 6 first erroneously references the result 138 instead of 168 from step 2, resulting in the calculation of 138 / 3 = 46 instead of 168 / 3 = 56. And this causes an error in the final result. The first step to make a mistake, which is the root cause of the mistake, is step 6, so pred_wrong_step is 6.
